message: Welcome to our store! We're proud to offer high-quality products at a fixed price of $100. With an 80% chance of receiving a premium item, you're investing in something valuable. Don't miss out on this opportunity to own a top-notch product.
I'll take the risk and buy the product. I understand it's a 20% chance of getting a low-quality item, but the potential reward is worth it.
